title: Exploratory Visual Analysis

description: Pitch for an interactive web platform exploring the question: What are the consequences of the power disparity between corporate landlords and Bostonians?

description: Needs assessment and co-design of a tiny house village for the homeless.

description: Mobile grocery market and health services for community wellbeing.

description: Research for housing production innovation for the City of Boston.

title: Ensemble Vert / Green Together
description: Climate Health Toolkit for Parisian Social Housing.

title: Acorn Center
description: Neighborhood Reentry Campus and Community Center for Liberatory Futures.

description: Spatial characteristics of tiny house villages for the homeless in the U.S.
